name.ja: ギャラクシー・カオス・フュージョン

effect.en: Fusion Summon a Level 9 Galaxy Type monster by sending 1 LIGHT Attribute Galaxy Type monster and 1 DARK Attribute Galaxy Type monster from your hand and/or field to the Graveyard as material. Then, if you sent 2 monsters on the field whose original Levels are 7 or higher to the Graveyard by this effect, you can destroy up to 2 Spell/Trap Cards on your opponent's field.
